turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hey can you go pick up something for me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a cup of coffee desperately.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i understand that, where would you like it from ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: could you order it from the starbucks onStarbucks on 4th Street in Colorado Springs

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure let me look that up right now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you, i am just so tired today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, i see that location on here. what would you like me to order you ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: do they still have the caramel brûlée latte ?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: give me one second, i will look that up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i think its a seasonal drink so i am not sure they still have it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no they do i see it on here what size would you like ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i would like a grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so a grande

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you know nevermind i really need a venti its one of those long kind of days.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes mondays will do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you also have them put extra whipped cream on the top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so extra whipped cream, what kind of milk would you like them to use

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: skim please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want the caramel sauce on top ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes that would be great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay so i am putting that all in now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great thank you so much !

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay so is that everything would you like a pastry or anything like that ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no i think i am good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so let me make sure i have this right

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: sure

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay so thats a a venti caramel brûlée latte with skim milk and extra whipped cream

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thats it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok it will be ready at the Starbucks on 4th Street in Colorado Spring shortly they will text you the receipt
